ygData.msgSnippet: ...  ... Lol. That was me. :-) Thanks for following up. I just figured, heck, he s level 50 and has a cool name, he must know what he s talking about. I
ygData.messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Andrew Simpson [mailto:hornsfan@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 5:49 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] What about the lvl 24 song?
>
>
> From: "Andrew Simpson" <hornsfan@...>
<snip>
> BTW, I inadvertantly deleted the email a few days ago from
> someone who
> responded about this, but I want to state up front, being
> level 50 doesn't
> affect my ability to make boneheaded testing decisions. If
> you think I'm
> wrong, my level should have nothing to do with whether you
> decide to speak
> up or not.
>
> Anthem Dirgemaker
> Level 50 Bard of Qeynos
> Solusek Ro

Lol. That was me. :-)

Thanks for following up. I just figured, heck, he's level 50 and has a cool
name, he must know what he's talking about. I love the explanation of your
test. Sounds like something I'd do.

Sincerely,
Windleaf Mistsong
Level 30 balladeer
Bertox
